item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, May 10, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Xenolab – Rasp Pi monitor for my pet carnivourus plants (25 points | 3 comments)
2. Sierpiński Triangle? In My Bitwise and? (13 points | discuss)
3. US vs. Google amicus curiae brief of Y Combinator in support of plaintiffs [pdf] (284 points | 431 comments)
4. Reverse engineering the 386 processor's prefetch queue circuitry (92 points | 29 comments)
5. A Critical Look at MCP (253 points | 156 comments)
6. For $595, you get what nobody else can give you for twice the price (1982) [pdf] (68 points | 22 comments)
7. The Price of Remission (55 points | 31 comments)
8. Pope Leo XIV: "AI poses new challenges re: human dignity, justice and labour" (21 points | discuss)
9. Show HN: PLAttice, for assembling structures much larger than the 3D printer bed (16 points | 3 comments)
10. Email Forwarding for Your Domain (30 points | 15 comments)
11. Adventures in Imbalanced Learning and Class Weight (19 points | 1 comment)
12. Show HN: LoopMix128 – Fast C PRNG (.46ns), 2^128 Period, BigCrush/PractRand Pass (3 points | discuss)
13. Comparison of C/POSIX standard library implementations for Linux (69 points | 21 comments)
14. Why the Apple II Didn't Support Lowercase Letters (2020) (4 points | 1 comment)
15. Embracer Games Archive is preserving 75000 video games and needs contributions (120 points | 59 comments)
16. Weave (YC W25) is hiring a founding engineer ( | hide)
17. Vision Now Available in Llama.cpp (474 points | 103 comments)
18. Microsoft Teams will soon block screen capture during meetings (62 points | 96 comments)
19. Show HN: Code Claude Code (80 points | 16 comments)
20. Eagle Hunters of Kyrgyzstan (5 points | discuss)
21. A simple 16x16 dot animation from simple math rules (310 points | 67 comments)
22. Prolog's Eternal September (2017) (65 points | 51 comments)
23. Private Japanese lunar lander enters orbit around moon ahead of a June touchdown (185 points | 58 comments)
24. Building Local-First Flutter Apps with Riverpod, Drift, and PowerSync (23 points | 13 comments)
25. Gmail to SQLite (283 points | 89 comments)
26. React Three Ecosystem (92 points | 34 comments)
27. Not a three-year-old chimney sweep (2022) (94 points | 56 comments)
28. Internet Roadtrip: Vote to steer (200 points | 35 comments)
29. 'It cannot provide nuance': UK experts warn AI therapy chatbots are not safe (83 points | 91 comments)
30. Intel: Winning and Losing (72 points | 39 comments)
